entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
